oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of tillage intensity and timing on nitrogen mineralization after a perennial forage crop
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wald, Fabian
Pekrun, Carola
Claupein, Wilhelm
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nutrient turnover
Soil tillage
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Information about the effect of single cultivation operations on N-mineralization after perennial legumes is relatively scarce. However, for nutrient saving management, particularly in organic farming, knowledge on these effects is essential.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Wald, Fabian; Pekrun, Carola and Claupein, Wilhelm (2000) Effect of tillage intensity and timing on nitrogen mineralization after a perennial forage crop. In: Proceedings of the 3rd International Crop Science Congress, p. 40.
